nodes.documentation:
@title A contract that can be destroyed by its owner after a delay elapses.
This contract allows an inheriting contract to be destroyed after
its owner indicates an intention and then waits for a period
without changing their mind. All ether contained in the contract
is forwarded to a nominated beneficiary upon destruction.
nodes.name: Mortal

typeDescriptions.typeString: literal_string "_selfDestructBeneficiary must not be the zero address"

arguments.value: _selfDestructBeneficiary must not be the zero address

argumentTypes.typeString: literal_string "_selfDestructBeneficiary must not be the zero address"

@dev Constructor
@param _selfDestructBeneficiary The account which will recieve any funds in this contract when killed.

argumentTypes.typeString: literal_string "Beneficiary must not be the zero address"

initiateSelfDestruct

@notice Terminate and reset the self-destruction timer.

nodes.name: selfDestruct

params._selfDestructBeneficiary: The account which will recieve any funds in this contract when killed.

initiateSelfDestruct().details: Only the contract owner may call this.

isOwner().return: true if `msg.sender` is the owner of the contract.

renounceOwnership().details: Allows the current owner to relinquish control of the contract.

selfDestruct().details: Only the contract owner may call this.

setSelfDestructBeneficiary(address).details: Only the contract owner may call this. The provided beneficiary must be non-null.

params._beneficiary: The address to pay any eth contained in this contract to upon self-destruction.

terminateSelfDestruct().details: Only the contract owner may call this.

transferOwnership(address).details: Allows the current owner to transfer control of the contract to a newOwner.

params.newOwner: The address to transfer ownership to.

devdoc.title: A contract that can be destroyed by its owner after a delay elapses. This contract allows an inheriting contract to be destroyed after its owner indicates an intention and then waits for a period without changing their mind. All ether contained in the contract is forwarded to a nominated beneficiary upon destruction.

initiateSelfDestruct().notice: Begin the self-destruction counter of this contract. Once the delay has elapsed, the contract may be self-destructed.

renounceOwnership().notice: Renouncing to ownership will leave the contract without an owner. It will not be possible to call the functions with the `onlyOwner` modifier anymore.

selfDestruct().notice: If the self-destruction delay has elapsed, destroy this contract and remit any ether it owns to the beneficiary address.

setSelfDestructBeneficiary(address).notice: Set the beneficiary address of this contract.

terminateSelfDestruct().notice: Terminate and reset the self-destruction timer.
